title: Love Island's Anton Danyluk and Belle Hassan are 'complicated'
text:
Belle and Anton still talk every day but can’t commit to each other (Picture: ITV)

Love Island’s Anton Danyluk and Belle Hassan split up only after their time on the show was over – but it seems that they’re not willing to quit each other just yet.

Scottish star Anton revealed that he is still ‘seeing’ Belle and talking to her on the phone every day after their break-up two months ago, but they’re not back together… yet.

Could they be about to give love another shot together?

Speaking to The Sun Online at the Pink News Awards, Anton said: ‘It is complicated, we are seeing each other when we can but it isn’t official.

‘We are both so busy but we still like each other so we will just have to see what happens in the future.’

He added that due to public appearance and work commitments the pair are barely able to spend time together – which makes having a relationship difficult.

The pair still have feelings for each other but admit the ‘problems are still there’ (Picture: ITV) Belle had previously suggested that the door is not fully closed with Anton either, blaming their schedules for not being able to give their romance the attention it needed.

She told Metro.co.uk that although they ‘still talk here and there’ it was ‘really hard when he’s traveling and we’d go two or three days without talking’.

She added: ‘And for me, when I’m seeing someone, I need more than that. At least if I’m not seeing you, call me, pick up the phone.’

When they are together though, it seems the chemistry is well and truly still there – with the couple getting involved in raunchy games and Belle licking Anton’s abs during a date night last week.

Never say never, you guys…
